title: AI Data Centre Electricity Demand Increasing US Utility Bills, Putting Households in Debt
description: Rising energy demand from power-hungry AI data centres is straining household budgets, with the average overdue utility bill balance continuing to grow.
content:
Electricity prices tracked inflation from 2013 to 2023 but are likely to outpace inflation at least until 2026, according to the Energy Information Administration forecast earlier this year.
The EIA… [+3495 chars]
